source.bb3af477:
col_name = ['col1']
list1 = [1, 2, 3]
array1 = np.array(list1)
print('array1 shape: ', array1.shape)

df_list = pd.DataFrame(list1, columns=col_name)
print('DataFrame made from a 1 dimension list:\n', df_list)

df_array = pd.DataFrame(array1, columns=col_name)
print('DataFrame made from a 1 dimension ndarray:\n', df_array)

         'birthday': birthday,
         'occupation': occupation}

df = pd.DataFrame(dict1)

source.50b59fc1:
Pandas data type

* int : integer
* float : decimal
* object : text, string
* bool : True, False
* datetime : data, time
* category : category
